title: _ARE_BOMB_BAY_DOORS_OPEN
content:
0xD0917A423314BBA8// AreBombBayDoorsOpen
BOOL _ARE_BOMB_BAY_DOORS_OPEN(Vehicle aircraft);
Parameters:aircraft: The vehicle to check the bomb bay doors on.Returns: A bool indicating the state of the doors (true = open, false = closed).Returns true when the bomb bay doors of this plane are open. False if they're closed.Old name:  _GET_ARE_BOMB_BAY_DOORS_OPENExamples:LuaC#local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)

if AreBombBayDoorsOpen(vehicle) then
    print("The doors are open!")
else
    print("The doors are closed!")
end
codeBlocks:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for _ARE_BOMB_BAY_DOORS_OPEN
_reBombBayDoorsOpen(vehicle)
